mapper.select:
select goods_in.* , goods.name as goods_name from goods_in left join goods on goods_in.goods_id = goods.id
and goods_name like concat('%', #{goods_name}, '%')
order by goods_in.id desc
mapper.insert: insert into goods_in(id, goods_id, num, channel, date, comment) values (#{id}, #{goods_id}, #{num}, #{channel}, #{date}, #{comment})
mapper.update: update goods_in set goods_id = #{goods_id}, num = #{num}, channel = #{channel}, date = #{date}, comment = #{comment} where id = #{id}
